paper_abstract: The article demonstrates the capabilities of Anticipatory Classifier System in solving the data mining tasks. It is a first application of anticipatory learning to a real world exploration tasks. The results of experiments with Monk's, Voting-record and WBC problems are shown as well as comparison of these results with other systems is presented. ACS handles these tasks quite well even though it is designed for a different kind of problems. (c) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Mining knowledge from data using anticipatory classifier system
